name: TacoChess
description:
THIS IS TACO CHESS, a two-player hardcore chess game featuring beloved characters from the hit game TacoCat. Play as Alex or Jamie, move pieces featuring tacos and cats, and most importantly have fun.

To play download one of the below zip files, unzip it, then run the TacoChess.exe. Press the play button, and the game begins. The rules are exactly like chess, click on a piece to see where they can move, then click again on a tile to move the piece. if you are not familiar with chess rules here is a great refresher! https://www.chess.com/terms/chess-pieces

The game is local multiplayer, which means both players use the same mouse or trackpad to move the pieces of their color. Blue goes first and red after.

_________

   Yo, Jamie, we have a feature in our chat where we can play games together! Wanna play some chess?    HAHAHA! Oh Alex. Poor, sweet, innocent little Alex. Don't you know that I'm the master at chess?    I've won many, MANY chess tournaments back in my day. You'll literally never defeat me.    Lol bet.

_________
